Basic Instructions

  • With Taskflow you can manage notes, lists and tasks all in one place.
  • You can organize these work items into projects.
  • Items can be viewed per project using the Home page.

Create A Project

  • Click on the top left menu and click on Projects.
  • Click on thr plus button to create a new project.
  • Items can be associated with a specific project from the edit screen.
